testcase.name: Normal login
testcase.system-out: Given User already on login page............................................passed When User input "standard_user" as userName and input "secret_sauce" as password.passed Then User already on sales page.............................................passed

testcase.name: Invalid login
testcase.system-out: Given User already on login page............................................passed When User input "standard_user" as userName and input "" as password........passed Then User see "Epic sadface: Password is required" error text on login page.passed

testcase.name: Invalid login 2
testcase.system-out: Given User already on login page............................................passed When User input "" as userName and input "secret_sauce" as password.........passed Then User see "Epic sadface: Username is required" error text on login page.passed

testcase.name: Invalid login 3
testcase.system-out: Given User already on login page............................................passed When User input "Aditya" as userName and input "dwi" as password............passed Then User see "Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service" error text on login page.passed

testcase.name: Invalid login 4
testcase.system-out: Given User already on login page............................................passed When User input "" as userName and input "" as password.....................passed Then User see "Epic sadface: Username is required" error text on login page.passed

testcase.name: User checkout product on SauceDemo
testcase.system-out: Given User already on login page............................................passed When User input "standard_user" as userName and input "secret_sauce" as password.passed Then User already on sales page.............................................passed When User sort product list by "Name (Z to A)"..............................passed And User select item product "Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)" and "Sauce Labs Onesie".passed And User click cart button..................................................passed Then User already on cart page..............................................passed When User delete product "Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)"................passed And User click checkout button..............................................passed Then User already on checkout page..........................................passed When User enters details firstName "Aditya" lastName "Dwi" and postalCode "1234".passed And User click button continue..............................................passed Then User already on overview page..........................................passed And User verify product "Sauce Labs Onesie".................................passed And User verify inventory item price "$7.99"................................passed And User verify price total "Item total: $7.99".............................passed And User verify tax "Tax: $0.64"............................................passed And User verify that "Total: $8.63".........................................passed When User click finish button...............................................passed Then User able to see confirmation message as "Thank you for your order!"..passed

testcase.name: User cannot input data checkout with invalid data
testcase.system-out: Given User on login page....................................................passed When User input "standard_user" as UserName and input "secret_sauce" as Password.passed Then User already on product page...........................................passed When User select item product "Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)"...........passed And User click cart button..................................................passed And User click checkout button..............................................passed Then User already on checkout information...................................passed When User input "" as firstName and input "" as lastName and postalCode ""..passed And User click continue to your overview page...............................passed Then User see "Error: First Name is required" error popUp on your information page.passed

testcase.system-out: Given User on login page....................................................passed When User input "standard_user" as UserName and input "secret_sauce" as Password.passed Then User already on product page...........................................passed When User select item product "Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)"...........passed And User click cart button..................................................passed And User click checkout button..............................................passed Then User already on checkout information...................................passed When User input "" as firstName and input "Dwi Irawan" as lastName and postalCode "53235".passed And User click continue to your overview page...............................passed Then User see "Error: First Name is required" error popUp on your information page.passed

testcase.system-out: Given User on login page....................................................passed When User input "standard_user" as UserName and input "secret_sauce" as Password.passed Then User already on product page...........................................passed When User select item product "Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)"...........passed And User click cart button..................................................passed And User click checkout button..............................................passed Then User already on checkout information...................................passed When User input "Aditya" as firstName and input "" as lastName and postalCode "12212".passed And User click continue to your overview page...............................passed Then User see "Error: Last Name is required" error popUp on your information page.passed

testcase.name: User cannot input data checkout with invalid data 4
testcase.system-out: Given User on login page....................................................passed When User input "standard_user" as UserName and input "secret_sauce" as Password.passed Then User already on product page...........................................passed When User select item product "Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)"...........passed And User click cart button..................................................passed And User click checkout button..............................................passed Then User already on checkout information...................................passed When User input "Aditya" as firstName and input "Dwi Irawan" as lastName and postalCode "".passed And User click continue to your overview page...............................passed Then User see "Error: Postal Code is required" error popUp on your information page.passed
